column1: The cold can't be vaccinated against because there are around 160 strains. The COVID19 is REINFECTING which indicated it is forming different strains, THE SAME AS THE COLD! #coronavirus

Why economists delight in disasters like #bushfires and #coronavirus . #CapitalismKills #Capitalismhttps://www.abc.net.au/news/2020-02-17/why-economists-delight-in-doom-coronavirus-bushfires/11970506 …

#coronavirus can be so mild you may never get symptoms (asymptomatic), but you will still spread it. It will spread widely because of that. Mostly not as harmful as flue. I would stock up on Vitamin C and take high doses (at least 10 grams a day). A vaccine is prob years away.
